text: McFarland, USA is a 2015 American sports drama movie directed by Niki Caro and starring Kevin Costner, Maria Bello, Morgan Saylor, Elsie Fisher, Diana-Maria Riva, Vanessa Mart√≠nez, Valente Rodriguez, Natalia Cordova-Buckley. It was distributed by Walt Disney Pictures. The protagonist is a sports coach named Jim White (played by Kevin Costner). He moves with his family to the mainly Hispanic town of McFarland, California and starts a cross-country running team. It is based on a true story. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2015 movies Category:2015 drama movies Category:2010s sports movies Category:Movies directed by Niki Caro Category:American sports drama movies Category:Teen sports movies Category:Movies set in California Category:Spanish-language movies
title: McFarland, USA
